column1: helka is a Quenya word meaning "ice-cold".
Helge Fauskanger has suggested the spelling helca
column2: to conform with the Quenya spelling used in The Lord of the Rings.Helge Fauskanger
column3: "http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/eng-quen.rtf English-Quenya Wordlist (Quettaparma Quenyanna)" at http://folk.uib.no/hnohf/ Ardalambion (accessed 25 June 2011)
